reasoning:

Each discard compounds the penalty—after three discards I'd be at -3 mult—so I need to weigh whether a fresh draw justifies the scaling cost. d: -1 mult

The negative multiplier is really dragging down my score. I should try playing a hand soon to get the Green Joker multiplier working in my favor, even if it's not perfect. A pair of 6s at -1 mult only gives around 22 chips though, which is too weak.
